body_html:
@facaiy Hi, I tried the code of my first post on CPU with pip install tf-nightly and on GPU with pip install tf-nightly-gpu. Both on Ubuntu 16.04 and with CUDA 9.0 and cuDNN 7.3.1 for GPU.
But I still get the same behaviours: CPU takes into account the batch dimension in the returned indices while GPU does not.
Did I do something wrong ?
